TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DesignTimeResourceProviderFactoryAttribute extends System.Attribute

Docs.summary: Specifies the type of resource provider factory for design time. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The DesignTimeResourceProviderFactoryAttribute class allows a <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ResourceProviderFactory> object to specify the type of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignTimeResourceProviderFactory> object. The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignTimeResourceProviderFactory> class is used to create design-time providers for reading and writing resources. Within [!INCLUDE[vsprvsext](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], a developer can use the **Generate Local Resource** command on the **Tools** menu to create resources during design time.
## Examples The following code example shows a customized resource provider factory that specifies a customized design-time resource provider factory through the DesignTimeResourceProviderFactoryAttribute attribute. This example does not include the code necessary to implement a customized design-time resource provider factory.
[!code-vb[System.Web.Compilation.ResourceProviderFactory#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.web.compilation_11_1.vb)] [!code-cs[System.Web.Compilation.ResourceProviderFactory#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.web.compilation_11_1.cs)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string factoryTypeName) cil managed

Docs.param: The name of the resource provider factory type.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the attribute set to the specified factory type name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.Compilation.DesignTimeResourceProviderFactoryAttribute> attribute is set to `factoryTypeName`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Type factoryType) cil managed

Docs.param: The type of the resource provider factory.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the attribute set to the qualified name of the specified factory type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.Compilation.DesignTimeResourceProviderFactoryAttribute.FactoryTypeName%2A> property is set to the <xref:System.Type.AssemblyQualifiedName%2A> property value of the `factoryType` parameter.

Docs.summary: Gets the value of the factory type name.
Docs.value: A <xref:System.String> containing the name of the factory type.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance bool IsDefaultAttribute() cil managed

Docs.summary: Determines whether the default provider is used.
